snippet.title: Grabatron - iPhone & iPad Gameplay Video
snippet.description:
Grabatron on the App Store: http://goo.gl/BbPyS

Category: "Games", "Action", "Arcade", "Entertainment"

****************************************************************************
Subscribe to get DAILY UPDATES with games released on the iOs
***************************************************************************
Like us on Fb: http://www.facebook.com/pages/iGamesView/153317034746744
Twitter @ iGamesView : http://twitter.com/iGamesView
Follow Us on Google Plus : iGamesView

***************************************************************
If you are a game developer and you wanted a trailer or a video onto the channel then shoot across a message or you can also mail to :
igamesview@gmail.com
*************************************************************
Logos and trademarks belongs to respective owners.

Appstore Description:

"Crazy high replay value, Future Games Of London has delivered one of the best action games in the AppStore" - App Shack 4.5/5

Grabatron is the latest massively addictive game from the makers of Hungry Shark.

Take control of a UFO with a retractable claw and destroy the puny humans!
Terrorise them anyway you like: Toss them, crush them, abduct them - it's up to you.

Explore a huge and varied environment with hours of action packed gameplay. 

* Beautiful HD Graphics
* Realistic Physics 
* Huge world to explore
* Find hidden power-ups
* Upgrade your ship
* Over 30 different missions
* Global Hi-scores with OpenFeint and GameCenter
* Tilt control 

Grabatron - where being evil has never been so much fun!

Crash issues reported on iPod touch 2G. Ours work fine, please email support@fgol.co uk with your device model so we can fix it! Settings/General/About/Model. Try disabling background apps like Spotify and reboot your device... Thanx!
